/.title: Dream Dice
/.description: A website with all my DM notes that I want to share with my players including services, player info, the story so far and faction jobs

/saucey.title: The Wizard's Staff
/saucey.description: The Wizard's Staff is a book you will find throughout Barovia, it is also available on Amazon and a great read!

/faction/overview.description: An introduction into the world of factions

/faction/wraithRaiders/jobs.description: A list of jobs and their status for the Wraith Raiders

/service/smith.title: Byllenan Smithy
/service/smith.description: Purchase and upgrade weapons, armour or a shield

/service/magic.title: Dathana Magical Emporium
/service/magic.description: Purchase scrolls, potions and access to the teleporter

/service/shop.title: General Curiosities
/service/shop.description: Buy and sell common adventuring items and tools

/service/fence.title: Mirapetor the Fence
/service/fence.description: A crafty person who buys and sells anything

/service/memory.title: Rictavioa's Memories
/service/memory.description: Has infomation about individuals in Barovia and will buy stories

/player/zordar.title: Zordar
/player/zordar.description: A dragonborn barbarian who likes to fight and drink

/player/godfrey.title: Godfrey the Guardian
/player/godfrey.description: A human paladin who is in a quest to rid his land of a mysterious plague

/player/xerus.title: Xerus
/player/xerus.description: A tiefling warlock who was found hiding inside his magic ring

/player/arty.title: Artefact #4546B a.k.a Arty
/player/arty.description: A warforged cleric who channels Talos and was discovered during and excavation

/player/gorek.title: Gorek Gottrisson
/player/gorek.description: An artificer dwarf who was exiled from his home for tinkering with items

/player/dwight.title: Dwight Ribble
/player/dwight.description: An elf ranger who is always hiding in the shadows

/player/kuquar.title: Ku-Quar
/player/kuquar.description: A lizardfolk ranger that sacrificed himself to save his friends

/random.title: Random Item Generator
/random.description: A couple of tools used to generate items for my players

/credits.title: Credits
/credits.description: A list of credited people and thanks

/story/forward.title: Forward
/story/forward.description: The forward for the journey through Barovia

/story/chapter1.title: Chapter 1 - Werewolves in the Mist
/story/chapter1.description: Our adventurers take on the mission to take out the Werewolves in the Mist

/story/chapter2.title: Chapter 2 - The Durst Manor
/story/chapter2.description: After walking through the mist the adventurers come across a manor, and chase a werewolf inside

/story/chapter3.title: Chapter 3 - The Forgotten Children
/story/chapter3.description: Whilst exploring the manor the adventurers come across the ghosts of two children of the manor

/story/chapter4.title: Chapter 4 - The Cultist Dungeon
/story/chapter4.description: Finding a secret stairway the adventurers make their way down into a cultists dungeon

/story/chapter5.title: Chapter 5 - The Fallen Brethren
/story/chapter5.description: To escape the house with their lives one of the adventurer's sacrifices himself for the others

/story/chapter6.title: Chapter 6 - The Dreary Village
/story/chapter6.description: The village of Barovia is in ruins, a tavern is required for a long-awaited rest

/story/chapter7.title: Chapter 7 - A Blood Thirsty Encounter
/story/chapter7.description: While burying the deceased burgomaster the group come across a horrid creature who is out for blood

/story/chapter8.title: Chapter 8 - Fortunes and Fate
/story/chapter8.description: The group move on and meet Madam Eva who tells them their fortune

/story/chapter9.title: Chapter 9 - The Cursed Encounter
/story/chapter9.description: Whilst making their way to Vallaki they are swept away to meet Strahd for dinner1

/story/chapter10.title: Chapter 10 - Reclaiming the Windmill
/story/chapter10.description: After surviving their visit to Castle Ravenloft the group seek refuge in a windmill

/story/chapter11.title: Chapter 11 - Haunting Pastries
/story/chapter11.description: They climb the windmill to clear out the hags who haunt it

/story/chapter12.title: Chapter 12 - Doomed Mine
/story/chapter12.description: After leaving the windmill they spy a mine full of riches

/story/chapter13.title: Chapter 13 - The Demon Hand
/story/chapter13.description: Finally they reach Vallaki and are greated by the leader of the guards who let's them pass

/story/chapter14.title: Chapter 14 - The Madhouse
/story/chapter14.description: The group, lead by Izek, make their way and meet the cold Baron and mad Baroness

/story/chapter15.title: Chapter 15 - Twisted Teleportation
/story/chapter15.description: Everyone makes their way into the attic to find the butler and lady-in-waiting

/story/chapter17.title: Chapter 17 - The Gottrisson Mine
/story/chapter17.description: Gorek leads the way through the sewers and everyone makes their way into the Gottrisson Mines

/story/chapter18.title: Chapter 18 - The Last of the Gottrisson's'
/story/chapter18.description: The group find the last Gottrisson's and solve a 500 year old murder to free their souls
